item.description:
Meet at the cafe at Borders and listen to some local talent while sipping on a hot java, latte or whatever you prefer.

Are you talented? Then maybe you'd like to participate in the talent line up.

I'll be there by 5:45 to get a table, so please feel free to join me then if you can. Otherwise feel free to come any time during the night. The show ends at 9 pm and the store closes at 10 pm.
item.name: Open Mic Night this Friday at Borders in Shrewsbury
